title: Primus Gardener Weed Torch
features: Piezo ignition allows flame at touch of a button, regulator valve, use propane or mixture of propane
/butane, use 14 or 16.2oz. cylinders, length 30.3in., weight 1.65lbs., gas consumption 10.3oz. per h
description: Weed Torch - Your own mini flame thrower! The use of heat for weed control is nothing new...professional gardeners have relied on it for a long time. Now, you too can fight weeds effectively and conveniently. No more chemical hazards or messy clean up. Unit is complete with Piezo ignition which provides a flame at the touch of a button. Runs on propane or a mixture of propane/butane in 14 or 16.2 oz. cylinders (not included). 30.351 in length. Optional 8 ft. hose assembly allows you to use with any bulk tank application.
